article_title: Google Brings in Chief for Self-Driving Cars
article_text:
Google Inc. is ready to turn its self-driving car technology into a business and has hired an auto-industry veteran to run it.

Google said John Krafcik, president of online car-shopping service TrueCar Inc., is joining as CEO of its car project in late September. Chris Urmson, the former head of the project, will lead technical...

twitter.description: Google has hired auto-industry veteran John Krafcik as CEO of the self-driving car project, sending a message that it is keen to work with Detroit to commercialize the technology.
twitter.creator: @alistairmbarr

image.alt: Google hires auto-industry veteran as chief of self-driving cars $GOOG

twitter.title: Google Brings in Chief for Self-Driving Cars
